attributes.additional_details:
Are you feed up with the price of fuel bills going through the roof & believe that private energy companies are not competitive!

We should buy our fuel as 1 nation & invest in greener energy sources as 1 nation!

Think about it, as these private companies make billions £'s which we as a nation should banking to make cheaper & renewable fuels!

Think of these companies like petrol stations no matter how far you drive they never offer any real hard cash in your pocket savings.
